topics.body:
Ahhhh, after a hard morning's work I have the weekend to myself to reflect upon subjects dear to my heart in resplendent glory. 
Or play video games. Whichever.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
Oh wow! The people next door to us gave my Mom Flower!

They were saying thank you for being a nice person and looking out for them.

My Mom is feeling so good today. which makes me feel good.

I love seeing my mom have a good day.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body: I've been playing the SNES version of the original Dragon Quest lately.

topics.body:
Also I gave a BP pony a name today that people liked.

Never done that before.
